original_text: At this I fell at his feet to worship him. But he said to me, “Don’t do that! I am a fellow servant with you and with your brothers and sisters who hold to the testimony of Jesus. Worship God! For it is the Spirit of prophecy who bears testimony to Jesus.”
korean_text: 내가 그 발 앞에 엎드려 경배하려 하니 그가 나에게 말하기를 나는 너와 및 예수의 증언을 받은 네 형제들과 같이 된 종이니 삼가 그리하지 말고 오직 하나님께 경배하라 예수의 증언은 예언의 영이라 하더라

sentences.original_text: At this I fell at his feet to worship him
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그의 발 앞에 엎드려 경배하려 하니

sentences.original_text: I am a fellow servant with you
and with your brothers and sisters
who hold to the testimony of Jesus
For it is the Spirit of prophecy
